title: New Listing!! One bed one bath for rent!!
posting_body: 17049 Vanowen St, Van Nuys, CA 91406 It is bordered by several Middle Schools, shopping in the heart of the Valley!
OPEN HOUSE SATURDAY AND SUNDAY FROM 9:00 TO 1:00.

_____________________________________________________________ Features: Rent: $1,795 Deposit: $1,795 Granite counter-tops Spacious living area Laminate floors throughout Laundry on-site 1 parking space Water & Trash paid by Landlord One Year Lease
THIS UNIT SHOWN BY APPOINTMENT ONLY *** Please call on-site Manager Antonio at to schedule a viewing OR For more information, please call or text our friendly staff!

Go to <URL> <URL> OR APPLY IN PERSON!

Apply with the manager at the showing, Bring 2 pictures of forms of Government issued ID's (non-expired), last 3 Pay Stubs and last 3 complete Bank Statements, as proofs of income, along with $40.00 money order for each applicant 18 and over.
